title: Cryoknight
content:
Cryoknight is one of the three factions a player can join after partial completion of the Nullify the corruption Main Quest.




 * Metal Buckler




 * Flanged Mace
 * Rapier
 * Shortsword


 * Battleaxe
 * Broadsword
 * Longsword


 * Throwing Twinblades
 * Throwing Rings
 * Metal Javelins
 * Throwing Knives
 * Throwing Axes
 * Metal Bow
